title: Installation locaiton '/usr/share/' instead of '/opt'
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

Yes

### Describe the bug

Change installation location from /opt to /usr/share

### What package are you using?

deb

### Version

1.13.0

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
It's not necessorily a bug but I was just wondering most .deb packages are installed inside '/usr/share/[app]'. This application is installed inside '/opt/'. Is it possible to install it inside the '/usr/share' folder?
```
